story-texts.text: You start awake, with only a flame clinging to a stonewall to provide light.Registering the cold, you find yourself sitting against a bare stonewall and floor, at the end of a passage. You try to collect your thoughts but cant remember anything, your mind goes blank eveytime you try to recall any memory. You stand up and notice a glint of something at the end of the light's reach. You stand up and grab the torch.
Upon inspecting the object you find out it's a lockpick and torque wrench

options.text: Take the lockpick, might come in handy.
Ignore the lockpick and start walking.

story-texts.text: After a few minutes of walking, you notice a door coming up ahead to the right of the passage.
